wikipedia_page.main: Nathan Wyburn (born 24 October 1989) is a Welsh artist and media personality who has created celebrity portraits (iconography) and pop culture imagery using non-traditional media such as foodstuffs and other household items, most notably working with Marmite on toast. He has personally created works of art for such notable subjects as Madonna, Prince Charles, Mariah Carey, Dame Shirley Bassey, Catherine Zeta-Jones and The Jacksons.

response: Between 2013 and 2016, local organisers Wayne Courtney and Nathan Wyburn have hosted the 'Roath Bake OffThe Great Roath Bake Off 2013', RoathCardiff.net, 18 February 2013. Retrieved 2018-12-14. festival in St Andrews United Reformed Church, Roath. In December 2018, the duo announced that the event would be revived for 2019'Roath Bake Off - 2019 announcement', Facebook - Roath Rocks, 13 December 2018. Retrieved 2018-12-14. as part of the campaign to raise funds for the church it is held in.
